definitions.definition: (especially of something hot or warm) to produce a steady light that is not very bright
examples: The embers still glowed in the hearth.
The lighted candles glowed in the darkness.
The strap has a fluorescent coating that glows in the dark.
A cigarette end glowed red in the darkness.
